attributes.action: Call for a General Election by April 2023
attributes.additional_details: During the previous 12 years of conservative rule we the British people have seen a steady decline of our NHS to the now current state of failure. The highest inflation since 1993. Countless scandals from MPs and Prime minister's alike of which we have had 5 during this period. A total lack of competence during the COVID19 pandemic resulting in failed PPE and unnecessary suffering. The blatant profiteering and cowardice must end we demand a General Election as a first step to healing the UK.
attributes.background: In light of the current multiple crisis facing the UK and the governments absolute incompetents dealing with these matters. The British people call for a General Election to choose who leads us through this period.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Call an immediate general election to end the chaos of the current government: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
